thread.title: Dem. Lawmaker Asks Whether Trump Needs ‘Mental Health Exam’ After Latest Twitter Tirade
thread.title_full: Dem. Lawmaker Asks Whether Trump Needs ‘Mental Health Exam’ After Latest Twitter Tirade

author: Ken Meyer
title: Dem. Lawmaker Asks Whether Trump Needs ‘Mental Health Exam’ After Latest Twitter Tirade
text:
Dem. Lawmaker Asks Whether Trump Needs ‘Mental Health Exam’ After Latest Twitter Tirade by Ken Meyer | 8:28   
As President Trump continues to hammer the media and his political opponents, a Democratic congressman is suggesting its time for the president to have a psychological review. 
Earlier today, Trump went on a tweetstorm against the “FAKE NEWS” New York Times , while also blasting the “so-called judge” who blocked his executive order to limit immigration from several   
Enter Rep. Ted Lieu (D-CA), who turned Trump’s words back at him and asked his followers about whether the president needs a mental health exam. Last 24 hrs on Twitter, @realDonaldTrump went on rant about "death & destruction,""FAKE NEWS,"&"evil." Should he get mental health exam? 
— Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 4, 2017 Pleased that this #saturdaymorning , @DHSgov will follow the Constitution rather than our So-called President. https://t.co/aZCHPQT20R 
— Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 4, 2017 
Later in the day, Lieu smacked Trump over a tweet where the president simply issued his campaign slogan: “Make America Great Again.” Uh-oh, even @realDonaldTrump can't figure out how to defend his crazy actions. He's now just shouting campaign slogans. #SoCalledPresident https://t.co/MaBvaXrAcS 
— Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 4, 2017 
[Image via Facebook]
